name: Fog and Glass
description:
This is a linear story game, there is no real "game" and not much interaction, just use right to advance the story, left to go back.

By Alex Bezuska and Cara Smith

Please rate on Ludum Dare: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/38/fog-and-glass/

Ambient audio by mario1298
http://freesound.org/people/mario1298/sounds/18124...
